data.lyric:
[ti:xanny]
[ar:Billie Eilish]
[al:WHEN WE ALL FALL ASLEEP, WHERE DO WE GO?]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]xanny - Billie Eilish
[00:00.21]Lyrics by：Billie Eilish O'Connell/Finneas O'Connell
[00:00.42]Composed by：Billie Eilish O'Connell/Finneas O'Connell
[00:00.64]What is it about them
[00:04.79]I must be missing something
[00:09.21]They just keep doing nothing
[00:13.77]Too intoxicated to be scared
[00:18.20]Better off without them
[00:22.24]They're nothing but unstable
[00:26.59]Bring ashtrays to the table
[00:30.99]And that's about the only thing they share
[00:36.76]I'm in their second hand smoke
[00:40.86]Still just drinking canned coke
[00:45.30]I don't need a xanny to feel better
[00:53.74]On designated drives home
[00:59.02]Only one who's not stoned
[01:02.78]Don't give me a xanny now or ever
[01:10.58]Wakin' up at sundown ooh
[01:14.59]They're late to every party ooh
[01:19.02]Nobody's ever sorry ooh
[01:23.71]Too inebriated now to dance
[01:27.84]Morning as they come down come down
[01:32.13]Their pretty heads are hurting hurting
[01:36.53]They're awfully bad at learning learning
[01:41.16]Make the same mistakes blame circumstance
[01:46.52]I'm in their second hand smoke
[01:50.54]Still just drinking canned coke
[01:55.02]I don't need a xanny to feel better
[02:03.57]On designated drives home
[02:08.13]Only one who's not stoned
[02:12.47]Don't give me a xanny now or ever
[02:21.52]Please don't try to kiss me on the sidewalk
[02:28.67]On your cigarette break
[02:38.21]I can't afford to love someone
[02:44.84]Who isn't dying by mistake in silver lake
[03:03.92]What is it about them
[03:08.06]I must be missing something
[03:12.34]They just keep doin' nothing
[03:16.94]Too intoxicated to be scared
[03:25.95]Hmm hmm
[03:34.52]Hmm mmm mmm mmm mmm
[03:43.71]Come down
[03:48.12]Hurting
[03:52.30]Learning
data.trans:
[ti:xanny]
[ar:Billie Eilish]
[al:WHEN WE ALL FALL ASLEEP, WHERE DO WE GO?]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.21]//
[00:00.42]//
[00:00.64]他们这是怎么了
[00:04.79]我错过了什么
[00:09.21]他们成天无所事事
[00:13.77]放纵自己 不懂得敬畏
[00:18.20]简直让人看了心烦
[00:22.24]他们反复无常
[00:26.59]除了桌子上放着的烟灰缸
[00:30.99]其他东西绝不肯分享
[00:36.76]我被迫吸着二手烟
[00:40.86]他们还在喝罐装可乐
[00:45.30]我不需要***给我带来快感
[00:53.74]开车把他们送回家
[00:59.02]只剩一个人还清醒着
[01:02.78]永远不要把***塞给我
[01:10.58]睡到太阳下山
[01:14.59]他们每次参加派对都要迟到
[01:19.02]根本不会感到愧疚
[01:23.71]醉得一塌糊涂 完全没法跳舞
[01:27.84]第二天早上终于清醒过来
[01:32.13]他们又头疼得厉害
[01:36.53]学习能力差到不行
[01:41.16]总是犯同样的错误 还找尽借口
[01:46.52]我被迫吸着二手烟
[01:50.54]他们还在喝罐装可乐
[01:55.02]我不需要***给我带来快感
[02:03.57]开车把他们送回家
[02:08.13]只剩一个人还清醒着
[02:12.47]永远不要把***塞给我
[02:21.52]请不要在人行道上非礼我
[02:28.67]在你抽空出来抽根雪茄的时候
[02:38.21]我不会爱上一个
[02:44.84]在Silver Lake放纵至死的人
[03:03.92]他们这是怎么了
[03:08.06]我错过了什么
[03:12.34]他们成天无所事事
[03:16.94]放纵自己 不懂得敬畏
[03:25.95]//
[03:34.52]//
[03:43.71]平复
[03:48.12]受伤
[03:52.30]学习
